nodes.text: The Klegger Corporation, also known simply as Klegger Corp, was a mining corporation that mined the planet Mustafar on the behalf of the Techno Union, a commerce guild of which Klegger Corp was a subsidiary. Once the dominant mining company on Mustafar, the corporation went bankrupt just before the end of the Clone Wars after most of their main plant, the Klegger Corp Mining Facility, collpased into the surrounding lava. Klegger Corp was never able to recover from the incident, allowing the Mensix Mining Company, a sunsidiary of Mensix Corp, to become the largest mining corporation on the planet.
